definition: to piss in one's pants in terror (idiom); scared witless
fart/flatulence/nonsense/(usu. in the negative) what/(not) a damn thing
to boil/to roll/to take a hike/Get lost!
see 尿[niao4]
to urinate/urine/CL:泡[pao1]
to flow/to disseminate/to circulate or spread/to move or drift/to degenerate/to banish or send into exile/stream of water or sth resembling one/class, rate or grade

sentences.english: If you don’t approach things right you can lose your ass.
sentences.chinese: 如果你做事情的方式不对，你会输得屁滚尿流。

sentences.english: Or should I just beat the shit out of you until you do hear me.
sentences.chinese: 还是要我把你揍得屁滚尿流了才听得见？

sentences.english: Why are you scared of horror movies? None of them are real.
sentences.chinese: 恐怖电影把我吓得屁滚尿流。

definition: to cover one's head and sneak away like a rat (idiom); to flee ignominiously
to be scared out of one's wits/to scare stiff
to kneel and beg forgiveness
to flee in defeat/to bolt
to be looking for one's teeth all over the floor/(fig.) to get beaten up badly/to beat the crap out of (sb)
to flee at the mere sight of (idiom)
rolling and crawling/trying frantically to escape (idiom)
lit. body and soul separated (idiom); fig. scared out of one's wits/beside oneself
to be scared out of one's wits (idiom)
to scatter in all directions
ashen-faced (idiom)
half dead (of torment, hunger, tiredness etc)/(tired) to death/(terrified) out of one's wits/(beaten) to within an inch of one's life/(knock) the daylights out of sb
to be in a sorry state/to be utterly defeated
ashen-faced
battered and exhausted/stuck in a dilemma
to scamper off/to scurry off like a frightened rat
